name: Attack on Metal
description:
We are Georgia Gwinnett College's Grizzly Game Development Club. We are always interested in participating  in events that will add on to our experiences and expand our social capital. Although GGC does not have a committed Game Development or Art program, we -- the Grizzly Game Development Club -- are dedicated to improve on our skills in thee field of Game Development.

The game is of the bullet hell genre where you play as a deceased metal guitarist -- who was revived by an unknown power -- to save the word and heavy metal from the aliens and their pop music.
